description: Defines the LearnTab widget, a Flutter stateless widget that displays a list of lessons and community leaderboards, integrating data from LearningProvider and CommunityProvider.

classes.name: LearnTab
classes.description: A stateless Flutter widget that displays learning lessons and community leaderboard details.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the LearnTab, displaying lessons and community leaderboards, and handles refresh actions.
